com.imperio

Interface ErrorHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorHandlerException, ErrorHandlerExit, ErrorHandlerNull, ErrorHandlerPrint

    public interface ErrorHandler

    Implementations of this class handle errors and warnings which may occur within the Imperio library. Developers may create their own implementations, or use the built-in options.

    ErrorHandlerException prints warnings to System.out and throws ImperioExceptions on errors

    ErrorHandlerExit behaves the same as ErrorHandlerPrint, but exits with the given error type's code after printing.

    ErrorHandlerNull silently ignores all warnings and errors, but does store the first error like the others.

    ErrorHandlerPrint prints errors to System.err and prints warnings to System.out

    Since:
    1.0.0
